Translations.Text: (Your Lord dekret vi ne worship escept Him your parents honor! As long as 1 ambaux them viv vi neniam dir al them Uff slightest gest annoyance) nor shall vi kri them; vi trakt them amicably
Kaj lower por them wings humility kindness dir My Lord hav mercy them ili raised me infancy
Your Lord est fully aware da your innermost thoughts. Vi argument righteousness Li est Forgiver de those pent
Vi don due alms relativ needy poor vojagx alien ne est excessive extravagant
extravagant est brethren diabl diabl est unappreciative de his Lord
Eben se vi turn them vi pursue mercy de your Lord vi trakt them nicest manier
Vi ne keep your man stingily lig your kol nor shall vi foolishly open gxi up lest vi end blamed kaj sorry
your Lord increases provision anyone Li chooses redukt gxi. Li est fully Cognizant de His creatures Seer
Vi ne kill your infan due al tim de poverty! Ni proviz por them tro vi. Killing them est gross offense
Vi shall commit adultery; gxi est gross pek evil behavior
Vi ne kill any ul - Por DI far life sankt! - Escept justice Unu killed unjustly tiam ni don his heir auxtoritat enforce justice Tiel li ne exceed lim vengx murd; li help
Vi ne tusx orf mon escept por their own bon gxis ili reach maturity. Vi fulfill your covenants covenant est great responsibility
Vi don plen mezur when vi meti pes equitably! This est put kaj righteous
Vi ne akcept any information vi verify gxi yourself. Mi don vi auxd eyesight cerb vi est responsible por uz them
Vi ne marsx proudly ter - Vi ne ted ter nor can vi est as tall as mont
All mav behavior kondamn your Lord
This est kelk da wisdom inspir al vi your Lord Vi ne set another di DI lest vi end Gehenna blamed defeated
your Lord don vi knab hav while don angxel daughters!? Kiel vi utter such blasphemy
(Ni cited en this Quran all kinds da ekzempl) ke ili pren heed Gxi nur eg their aversion
Dir tie est any ali di Him as ili pretend ili pen overthrow Possessor tron
Li glor Li est mult tro exalted far super their utterances
Glor Him est 7 univers ter everyone them! tie est nothing ne glor Him vi ne kompren their glorification! Li est Clement Forgiver
When vi leg Quran ni met vi those ne kred en Hereafter invisible barrier
Ni ej sxild their mens prevent them el kompren gxi, deafness their orel! Kaj when vi predik your Lord uz Quran sol ili kur aversion
Ni est fully aware da ki ili auxd when ili auxskult al vi when ili konspir secretly - disbelievers dir Vi sekv crazy hom
Not kiel ili describe vi kiel this kauxz them stray off path
Ili dir Post ni turn into ost er ni get resurrected re
